title: Rep. Eric Swalwell | Trump Confesses Amid Senate Impeachment Trial: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at House managers in the Senate impeachment trial seeking to prove that the president is a criminal who’s unfit for office.

Then, Representative Eric Swalwell discusses Trump’s Senate impeachment trial and whether or not it was worth it to pursue impeachment.

He also takes a few more questions backstage at Studio 8G.
